name: Sabre Cat
stunts: Pounce Attack: When attacking from stealth or higher ground, gain +2 to Fight and may create 'Pinned' aspect with one free invoke
Rending Claws: When successfully attacking with Fight, inflict an additional mild consequence 'Deep Lacerations' if target takes stress
Mountain Born: +2 to Athletics when moving through rocky or mountainous terrain
notes: Sabre cats are among Skyrim's most dangerous predators. They are solitary hunters that ambush prey from elevated positions. Their powerful jaws and claws can quickly overwhelm unwary travelers.
combat_tactics: Sabre cats prefer to ambush from hiding, using elevated terrain when possible. They focus on a single target, attempting to bring them down quickly with powerful attacks. They fight to the death when defending territory.
